title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

18:21 <drake01> has joined #xwiki  
18:26 <zh\_> has joined #xwiki  
18:28 <zh\_> Hi, I'm not using xwiki yet, but would like to know if it's possible with this product to have an "page text" only mode that can be used to embed specific content into another page (via iframe, etc), but still have full functionality for editing and normal wiki usage also.  Thanks  
18:29 <@sdumitriu> Hi zh\_  
18:29 <@sdumitriu> Try appending ?xpage=plain to the URL  
18:29 <@sdumitriu> Is that what you want?  
18:30 <zh\_> I'll try that with the playground site and see.  Would that disable any side bar and navigation and only show the page specific content?  
18:30 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
18:33 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:34 <zh\_> @sdumitriu, Just checked it out.  The plain text mode is exactly what I was looking for: http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/TestPage?xpage=plain  Thanks!
